title: Particle Life
description: Colorful particles with simple attraction and repulsion rules create mesmerizing, lifelike emergent behaviors.

title: Boids Flocking
description: Simulated birds follow three simple rules‚Äîseparation, alignment, cohesion‚Äîand complex flocking behavior emerges.

title: Game of Life
description: Conway's cellular automaton. Simple rules create complex patterns‚Äîgliders, oscillators, and glider guns.

title: Mandelbrot Explorer
description: Explore the infinite complexity of the Mandelbrot set. Zoom in forever and discover new patterns.

title: Fourier Drawing
description: Draw any shape, then watch rotating circles (epicycles) reconstruct it using Fourier transforms.

title: Fluid Simulation
description: Real-time fluid dynamics. Move your mouse to inject dye and watch it flow, diffuse, and swirl.

title: L-System Trees
description: Procedurally generated plants using Lindenmayer systems. Simple rewrite rules create organic structures.

title: Reaction-Diffusion
description: Gray-Scott model creates organic patterns‚Äîspots, stripes, and coral-like structures from chemical reactions.

title: Cloth Physics
description: Realistic cloth simulation using Verlet integration. Drag to interact, watch it tear under stress.

title: Ray Marching 3D
description: Real-time 3D rendering using signed distance functions. No polygons‚Äîpure mathematical shapes.

title: Double Pendulum
description: A chaotic system where tiny differences lead to wildly different outcomes. Watch the trails diverge.

title: Metaballs
description: Organic blobs that smoothly merge together using implicit surfaces. Move mouse to attract them.

title: Voronoi Diagram
description: Partition space into regions closest to each seed point. Click to add points, use Lloyd relaxation.

title: Terrain Generator
description: Sculpt procedural landscapes. Rotate, zoom, paint terrain with day/night cycle.

title: Wave Function Collapse
description: Procedural generation using constraint satisfaction. Watch patterns emerge from local rules.

title: Lorenz Attractor
description: The butterfly effect visualized. A chaotic 3D system discovered by Edward Lorenz.

title: Marching Squares
description: Contour line extraction algorithm. Used in topographic maps and medical imaging.

title: Delaunay Triangulation
description: Optimal triangulation that maximizes minimum angles. Click to add points.

title: Flow Field
description: Particles follow Perlin noise-based vector fields. Smooth, organic motion patterns.

title: Gravity Simulator
description: N-body gravitational physics. Click and drag to launch bodies with velocity.

title: Bezier Curves
description: Interactive spline editor showing de Casteljau's algorithm. Drag control points.

title: Langton's Ant
description: Simple rules create complex emergent patterns. Watch the 'highway' emerge after ~10k steps.

title: DLA
description: Diffusion-Limited Aggregation. Random walkers create fractal crystal growth patterns.

title: Fire Effect
description: Classic demoscene fire algorithm from the 90s. Retro pixel art aesthetic.

title: Maze Generator
description: Watch algorithms carve perfect mazes. Recursive backtracker, Prim's, and Kruskal's.

title: Spring Physics
description: Mass-spring system with damping. Drag nodes to interact, watch energy propagate.

title: Quadtree
description: Spatial partitioning for efficient collision detection. O(n log n) instead of O(n¬≤).

title: Sound Synthesizer
description: Web Audio API synth with ADSR envelope, filters, and real-time waveform visualization.

title: Shader Art
description: Real-time GLSL fragment shaders. GPU-accelerated procedural graphics.

title: A* Pathfinding
description: Optimal pathfinding algorithm. Draw obstacles and watch the shortest path form.

title: Sorting Comparisons
description: Race 6 sorting algorithms side-by-side. Bubble, Selection, Insertion, Merge, Quick, and Heap sort.

title: Dijkstra's Algorithm
description: Shortest path algorithm. Click nodes to set start/end and watch the optimal path emerge.

title: BFS vs DFS
description: Split-screen comparison of Breadth-First vs Depth-First Search. Watch their different exploration patterns.

title: Convex Hull
description: Find the smallest convex polygon containing all points. Jarvis March and Graham Scan algorithms.

title: Red-Black Tree
description: Self-balancing binary search tree. Watch rotations and color flips maintain balance.

title: Minimum Spanning Tree
description: Connect all nodes with minimum total weight. Compare Prim's and Kruskal's algorithms.

title: Huffman Encoding
description: Optimal prefix-free encoding. Watch the tree build as frequent characters get shorter codes.

title: Finite State Machine
description: Deterministic Finite Automaton. Test if strings match patterns like binary divisibility.

title: Turing Machine
description: Universal computation model. Watch the head read, write, and move on an infinite tape.

title: Binary Search Tree
description: Fundamental data structure. Insert, search, delete, and traverse with animated visualizations.

title: PDF Merge
description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document. Drag to reorder before merging.

title: PDF Split
description: Split PDFs into individual pages, page ranges, or chunks of N pages.

title: PDF Rotate
description: Rotate PDF pages 90¬∞, 180¬∞, or 270¬∞. Select individual pages or rotate all at once.

title: PDF Extract Pages
description: Select and extract specific pages from a PDF into a new document.

title: PDF Remove Pages
description: Remove unwanted pages from a PDF. Preview pages and select which to delete.

title: PDF Reorder Pages
description: Drag and drop to rearrange page order in your PDF document.

title: PDF to Images
description: Convert PDF pages to high-quality PNG or JPEG images. Adjustable resolution.

title: PDF Watermark
description: Add text watermarks to PDF documents. Customize position, size, opacity, and rotation.

title: PDF Page Numbers
description: Add page numbers to PDF documents. Customize format, position, and starting number.

title: PDF Text Extract
description: Extract all text content from PDF documents. Copy or download as plain text.

title: PDF Redact
description: Draw boxes to permanently redact sensitive content. Converts to image-based PDF for security.

title: Image Resize
description: Resize images by dimensions or percentage. Preset sizes and aspect ratio lock included.

title: Image Crop
description: Crop images with draggable selection. Supports aspect ratio constraints like 16:9 or 1:1.

title: Image Rotate & Flip
description: Rotate images by 90¬∞ increments and flip horizontally or vertically.

title: Image Convert
description: Convert images between PNG, JPEG, and WebP formats with quality control.

title: Image Filters
description: Apply filters and adjustments‚Äîbrightness, contrast, saturation, blur, and preset looks.

title: Image Watermark
description: Add text or image watermarks with customizable position, opacity, and tiling patterns.

title: Random Number Generator
description: Generate random numbers within a range. Supports multiple numbers and duplicate control.

title: Password Generator
description: Generate secure random passwords with customizable length and character options.

title: Dice Roller
description: Roll polyhedral dice for tabletop games. Supports d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, and d20.

title: Coin Flip
description: Flip a virtual coin with animated results and running statistics.

title: Random List Picker
description: Pick random items from a list. Great for decisions, raffles, or team selection.

title: UUID Generator
description: Generate universally unique identifiers (UUIDs). Supports v1 and v4 formats.

title: Timer & Stopwatch
description: Countdown timer with presets and stopwatch with lap times.

title: Date Difference
description: Calculate days, weeks, months, and years between two dates.

title: Timezone Converter
description: Convert times between world timezones with live world clocks.

title: Unix Timestamp
description: Convert between Unix timestamps and human-readable dates.

title: Age Calculator
description: Calculate exact age in years, months, days, and more from a birthdate.

title: Countdown to Date
description: Live countdown to any future date or event with progress tracking.

title: Audio Trim
description: Cut audio files to a specific start and end time with visual waveform editor.

title: Audio Merge
description: Combine multiple audio files into one. Drag to reorder, adjustable gap between files.

title: Audio Volume
description: Adjust volume or normalize audio levels with visual before/after waveform comparison.

title: Audio Speed
description: Change playback speed from 0.25x to 4x while preserving pitch using time-stretching.

title: Audio Reverse
description: Reverse audio playback with side-by-side original and reversed comparison.

title: Audio Fade

title: Remove Duplicate Lines
description: Remove duplicate lines from text with options for case sensitivity and trimming.

title: Sort Lines
description: Sort text lines alphabetically, numerically, by length, or randomly.

title: JSON Formatter
description: Format, validate, and minify JSON with syntax highlighting and error detection.

title: Regex Tester

title: Base64 Encoder
description: Encode and decode Base64 text with URL-safe variant support.

title: Hash Generator

title: Percentage Calculator

title: Unit Converter

title: Loan Calculator

title: Color Picker

title: Palette Generator

description: Check color contrast ratios for WCAG accessibility compliance (AA and AAA levels).

title: Color Converter
description: Convert colors between HEX, RGB, HSL, HSV, and CMYK formats.

description: Convert between CSV and JSON formats with delimiter options and header row support.

title: Markdown Preview

title: YAML ‚Üî JSON Converter
description: Convert between YAML and JSON formats with proper indentation handling.

title: XML ‚Üî JSON Converter
description: Convert between XML and JSON formats with attribute preservation.

title: Spin the Wheel
description: Customizable spinning wheel for random selection. Add your options and let fate decide!

title: Name Generator
description: Generate random names: full names, usernames, fantasy names, band names, and more.

title: Reaction Time Test
description: Test your reaction time! Click when the color changes from red to green.

description: Test your typing speed in WPM with accuracy tracking and difficulty levels.

title: Audio Recorder

title: System Info Dashboard
description: View your hardware specs: GPU, CPU cores, RAM, battery, network, and browser capabilities.

title: Prime Visualizer
description: Explore prime numbers through Ulam spirals, Sacks spirals, prime gaps, and animated sieving.

title: Julia Sets
description: Explore infinite fractal complexity. Each point in the Mandelbrot set defines a unique Julia set.

title: Apollonian Gasket
description: Recursive circle packing fractal using Descartes' Circle Theorem.

title: Spirograph
description: Draw beautiful hypotrochoid and epitrochoid curves with customizable parameters.

title: Collatz Conjecture
description: Visualize the 3n+1 problem. Every sequence seems to reach 1, but no one can prove it.

title: Bifurcation Diagram
description: The logistic map's route to chaos. Watch order dissolve into randomness, then find order again.

title: Hyperbolic Tiling
description: Escher-like tessellations in the Poincar√© disk. Infinite patterns in finite space.

title: 3D Globe Visualizer
description: Interactive 3D Earth with data overlays. Explore cities, flight paths, earthquake zones, and more.

description: Generate and customize QR codes with colors, logos, and styles. Supports URLs, WiFi, and contacts.

title: Audio Visualizer
description: Real-time audio frequency visualization with bars, waves, circular, and particle modes.

description: Watch a neural network learn in real-time. See neurons fire and weights adjust as it masters XOR, circles, and spirals.

title: Invoice Generator
description: Create professional PDF invoices with customizable templates, line items, taxes, and discounts.

title: Kaleidoscope

title: Signature Studio

title: Gradient Mesh Editor
description: Create complex multi-point gradient backgrounds with draggable color nodes and exportable CSS/SVG.
